about_the_game:
JumpMap is an exciting first-person 3D platformer that features a special mechanic: every time you fall, you get put back to where you were before. Explore 20+ carefully designed levels that challenge your skills in precision and timing. Now with Speedrun Mode: race through all levels and track your best times!

Your one and only goal is to reach the top of every level. Focus on climbing, navigating through challenges, and honing your abilities to conquer each ascent.






  • Speedrun Mode: Play through all levels in one go with the clock ticking. Track your time and aim for your best. Race against yourself and friends for the fastest completion!
  • Best Time Tracking: Keep track of your progress by measuring how quickly you complete each level and see your personal best times for added challenge and improvement.
  • Double Jump: Perfect your skills with the ability to jump again mid-air, mastering even the trickiest platforms and reaching new heights.
  • Controller and Steam Deck Support: Enjoy seamless gameplay whether you're using a controller or playing on the Steam Deck, allowing you to play comfortably on the go or from the comfort of your couch.
  • Pure Platforming: Focus solely on your platforming skills with no distractions—no bosses, weapons, or NPCs—just you and the thrill of mastering each climb and jump.
  • Ultra low graphics option: Optimize your gaming experience with a retro graphics setting designed specifically for older computers, ensuring smooth gameplay without compromising on fun.




You don't need to restart the level if you fall; the automatic rewind feature saves your progress on every platform.





Challenge yourself to complete all levels in one seamless run while the clock ticks.





Engage in a challenging race against the clock.






Every level in the game is meticulously crafted by hand, ensuring that each platform is thoughtfully designed and strategically placed to provide a challenging and rewarding experience for players.






Things you won't find in the game:

  • Enemies
  • Weapons
  • Jumpscares
  • Health bar



JumpMap is a labor of love by a solo developer, featuring entirely handmade levels.

name: JumpMap

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Window 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Ryzen 5 2600x or Core i5 8600
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel® UHD Graphics 730
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: GPU needs to be Vulkan compatible
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Window 11 64-bit
  • Processor: Ryzen 5 5600X or Core i5 11600K
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Radeon RX 6700 XT or Geforce RTX 2070
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

Explore 20+ carefully designed levels that challenge your skills. Now with Speedrun Mode: race through all levels and track your best times!
